entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow changing to snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
